name: Nayan Vishwakarma
bio: Always enthusiastic to explore new things

milestones.title: Winners of SIH Hardware Edition 2020
milestones.description: Team Leader of winning team Binary Bombers of SIH

milestones.title: Participated in AICTE National Level Chhatra Vishvakarma Awards 2020
milestones.description: Awarded with Participation Certificate at National Level under the category 'Mental Health and Psychosocial Support' for presenting an innovative solution of 'Gogo Assistant' under the theme India's Economic Recovery Post Covid; Reverse Migration and Rehabilitation Plan to support 'Atmanirbhar Bharat' at AICTE India.
